body.p:
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Ky., June 27th, 1862.
Col. J, S, Jackson
Dear Sir:

Your letter of yesterday accompanying presenting the rebel flag captured at Corinth by Capt Wolfling of your gallant regiment has ^with the trophy^ been received. and I have directed the trophy according to your request, ^it as requested by you^ to be deposited "amongst the memorials of the Commonwealth."

Respectfully your obt svt
B. Magoffin
